contents.text: Thank you for calling Ninety Nine Designs, the global creative platform for custom graphic design based in the East Bay.
To start a new design contest, press 1.
To launch a logo design contest, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our contests team for logo design.

navigationGoals: Launch a logo design contest to get a new company logo quickly.
Launch a logo contest to create a brand mark for my veterans support nonprofit
Spin up a crowdsourced logo design contest to generate a new brand mark
I would like to start a logo design contest to update my garden club’s emblem.
I’d like to launch a contest to develop a fresh logo for my university physics club.

contents.text: To launch a website or other design contest, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our contests team for websites and other projects.

navigationGoals: Start a website design contest to refresh my site’s look.
Run a website design contest to get a new site for my military outreach group
Launch a UI/UX website design contest to source prototypes and mockups
I need to launch a brochure design contest for my community center.
I’d like to start a competition to build a new website for my lab’s outreach program.

contents.text: To hire a designer directly, press 2.
To hire a designer for logo work, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our designer matching team for logo projects.

navigationGoals: Directly hire a designer to create a professional logo.
Hire a designer directly to craft a logo for my veteran assistance program
Directly onboard a senior logo designer for brand identity work
I want to hire a designer directly to create a new logo for my knitting group.
I want to hire a designer directly to create a custom badge for my quantum physics team.

contents.text: To hire a designer for website or other design services, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our designer matching team for websites and other design services.

navigationGoals: Find and hire a designer for a website redesign project.
Hire a web designer to build a site for my veterans support project
Contract a front-end/UI designer for my website redesign
I need to hire someone to redesign my personal blog’s website.
I want to hire a freelancer to revamp and add graphics to my research group’s site.
